page.description: Set the permissions and security groups for insert, update, and delete operations for a data bound UX Component.

section.note: Security must be turned on in your Alpha Anywhere project in order to add security permissions to your data bound UX Component.

item.name: Allow update
item.description: Defines whether or not update operations are permitted in the UX component.

item.name: Update security groups
item.description: Defines the user groups that are allowed to perform update operations in the UX component. If no security groups are selected, the operation is permitted for all uses.

item.name: Allow insert
item.description: Defines whether or not insert operations are permitted in the UX component.

item.name: Insert security groups
item.description: Defines the user groups that are allowed to perform insert operations in the UX component. If no security groups are selected, the operation is permitted for all uses.

item.name: Allow delete
item.description: Defines whether or not delete operations are permitted in the UX component.

item.name: Delete security groups
item.description: Defines the user groups that are allowed to perform delete operations in the UX component. If no security groups are selected, the operation is permitted for all uses.
